name: meta
description: An optional piece of text to display in the footer between the address and social media icons.

name: social
description: An optional object of social media.

params.name: items
params.description: A list of social media items.

params.name: href
params.description: The URL for the social media link.

params.name: icon
params.description: An icon to use for the social media link. Options are `twitter`, `youtube`, `facebook`, `flickr`, `instagram`, `rss` and `github`.

params.name: title
params.description: A title to use for the social media link.

params.name: shortTitle
params.description: A shorter title to display next to the social media icon. If not specified, the full title will be used.

name: navigation
description: An optional list of navigation sections to display in the main body of the footer.

params.name: title
params.description: The title of the navigation section.

params.name: hideTitle
params.description: If true, hide the title of the navigation section.

params.name: items
params.description: A list of items in the navigation section.

params.name: text
params.description: The text to display for the navigation item.

params.name: href
params.description: The URL of the navigation item.

params.name: title
params.description: An optional title for the navigation item, used for accessibility.

params.name: newTab
params.description: If true, open the link in a new tab.

name: legal
description: A list of 'legal' links to display in the footer such as the cookie page, accessibility statement, privacy policy and terms and conditions.

params.name: text
params.description: The text of the legal link item.

params.name: href
params.description: The URL of the legal link item.

params.name: title
params.description: An optional title for the item, used for accessibility.

name: themeSelector
description: Enable the theme selector (once settings cookies have been accepted).

name: currentTheme
description: The current theme which has been selected. Options are `system`, `light` and `dark`.

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the footer.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the footer.
